segments.text: I observe the angled view of this domestic kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is engrossed in drying that single plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the faucet runs unchecked, causing an overflow disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm angry at how preventable this mess is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down the front, puddling at her unaware feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a sloppy situation, with potential for slips everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbs the stool toward the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tipping backward; this is reckless behavior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl assists by reaching up, eyes on the prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking rules, sneaking treats like little bandits.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window overlooks a calm garden scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes line the path, everything orderly out there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If only the inside matched that tranquility.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool holds; the fall could be bad.
segments.speaker: PAR
